Acclimated in lab for """"less than 1 week"""" to match field conditions exactly; so technically field fresh + lab; but closer to field fresh. Removed tmin - these were inferred based on ice crystal formation but there was no sign of physiological distress. Corrected tmax to match author's conclusions about upper incipient lethal temperature (LT50 at 1 week).
